Text: Great, absolutly sensless movie! Invite your friends, get some beer and enjoy! Dont use your brain and you have lots of fun.

Hey Blitz,

You have a very interesting movie collection. Not all to my taste, but at least not clones of the same thing over and over.

Thanks for sharing!

This is, in my opinion, one of the best space/sci-fi movies created.

The movie quality is quite good both audio and video.
i cant find subtitles that fit. please help, this is one of my favourite sci-fi i would really like it in my collection. But w/o sub i cant use it for bedtime movie  :(

MDeity you're absolutely right! This is a SF movie as  should be. And Saffron Burrows ;-)  I love her !
Discovered her in the old Stargate Movie just recently.

Thanks Blitzer for UL and thanks 098 for the subs. May the Pilgrims never die !
